ounsel:         Vishwa de Livera Tennakoon  for the Accused-Appellant
Anoopa  De Silva , DSG for the State
The  Accused-Appellant  abovenamed  (hereinafter  referred  to  as  ‘the  Accused’)  was
indicted before the High Court of Gampaha for having committed the  offence of murder of
one Kongasdeniyage Ajith Kumara Sampath an offence made punishable under Section 296
